# Welcome to the Raubase-ROS package documentation

This website hosts the documentation about the package raubase_ros, a translation from the DTU Raubase software.

The original author of the code is *Jens Christan Andersen*, and the ROS2 conversion was made by *Geoffrey Côte* (aka [Meltwin](https://github.com/Meltwin) online).

This project is distributed under the MIT license.
Copyright © 2017 -2024 by DTU 

## Maintainer

This package is maintained by:

  - [Geoffrey Côte](https://github.com/Meltwin) ECN (General Engineering - Robotics) & DTU (MSc Autonomous Sytem) student 
  - [Jens Christan Andersen](mailto:jcan@dtu.dk) Associate professor in the Department of Electrical and Photonics Engineering (Automation and control)
  
## Dependencies

This projects runs on: 

  - ROS: ROS2 Humble,       
  - Python: 3.10
  - OS: Ubuntu 22.04,
  - Arch: Tested Raspberry Pi 4 and x86 computer,

|   Package    |                                         Link                                         |      Description      |
| :----------: | :----------------------------------------------------------------------------------: | :-------------------: |
|    rclcpp    |                                    ROS2 Standard                                     |          ROS          |
| ament_cmake  |                                    ROS2 Standard                                     | Compilation Toolchain |
|   std_msgs   |                                    ROS2 Standard                                     |          ROS          |
| sensor_msgs  |                                    ROS2 Standard                                     |       Messages        |
|    OpenCV    |                    [OpenCV website](https://opencv.org/releases/)                    |    Camera handling    |
|  cv_bridge   |       [Vision OpenCV Github](https://github.com/ros-perception/vision_opencv)        |  OpenCV - ROS bridge  |
| raubase_msgs | [Baxterminator - RobotBot MSG Github](https://github.com/Baxterminator/raubase_msgs) |    Custom messages    |
